dmca.title: Yahoo's C&D Breaks the Template
dmca.body:
DO YOU YAHOO!?
Fax message


date:	June 23, 2005
to:	User Support,DMCA Complaints
fax:	[private]
co: Google Inc.
tel:	[private]
from:	[private]
                    corporate counsel
                    yahoo! inc.
tel: [private]
fax: [private]
email: [private]@yahoo?inc.com
PP:	2 (incl. cover)
comments: please see attached

This facsimile transmission has been sent by the Legal Department of Yahoo! Inc. and is not intended for transmission to, or receipt by, any unauthorized persons. If you have received this transmission in error you many not copy or further distribute the correspondence or any part thereof. Please notify the sender of the error.


June 23, 2005

VIA FACSIMILE
[private]

Google Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: 	Copyright and Trademark Complaint regarding YAHOO!

User Support, DMCA Complaints:

1.	 The copyrighted work that has been infringed is the proprietary and copyrighted Yahoo! home page which may be viewed at: http://yahoo.com. Further involved is the unauthorized use of the famous YAHOO! trademark.

2.	The infringement (both copyright and trademark) occurs as a result of the Yahoo! template
Offered by Google Inc., through Blogger, at: http://blogger-templates.blogspot.com.

3.	I can be contacted at: Yahoo! Inc., [private], Sunnyvale, California 94089; email:
[private]@yahoo?inc.com; tel: [private]; fax: [private].

4.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted content and trademark as described above
is not authorized by the owner, its agent or the law.

5.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information that the notification is accurate and that I
am the copyright owner or authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[private]
Corporate Counsel 
Yahoo! Inc.


[private]? sunnyvale, CA 94089 ? phone [private] ? fax [private]
